title: Primecoin primality test
summary:
When I wrote about how Primecoin uses prime chains for proof of work, I left out a detail. To mine a new Primecoin block, you have to find a prime chain of specified length that starts with a number that is a multiple of the block header hash. According to the Primecoin whitepaper Another important […]

The post Primecoin primality test first appeared on John D. Cook.
